body_html:
Thanks for the pointer.
I will then try to precreate the virtualenv.

On Sat, Nov 5, 2016 at 9:57 PM, guschmue notifications@github.com wrote:

cmake will resolve the PYTHON_EXECUTABLE variable at cmake time. I know
there is a -D in ctest but its for some scripting/dashboard mode (I have
never used this)
